Nice product! Clean design
I love it I was a little confused at the beginning .but I get it in work great

Few minor glitches with the DAIR target but this is a great ap for archery shooters. It does so much and is so easy to use. The variety of targets you can select is fantastic. The data provided is amazing and so much easier to read and see compared to other target aps. So easy to mark arrows you just drag and drop on the target. Recommended.
Great for what i need tracking scores grouping progress

Apps not bad once I learned how to use it. My BIG GRIPE is: I cannot track my Xs on Vegas 3-spot. If I score a 10, it looks like an X. Missing that golden 10-ring around the nickel-sized x-ring. Please fix this. I'd pay for the app with this simple feature. üéØ Got it thanks. But it scores 11s not X's. üòí There's an X-5-4-3 option. Any chance you could add X-10-9-8-7-6 option? You know Vegas Style (?) Figured it out - recurve style? Umm ok.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You need to set another scoring style at the top of the screen where you select the target face. Please refer to the help page inside the app for more information on the scoring styles.

google_play_reviews.content: The score keeping is great and I love the Wear OS integration. My main gripe is the "backup and restore" feature DOESNT WORK! As someone who has multiple phones and just wants to make sure i can backup my data, this is a major disappointment for me. If that feature worked, the app would be near perfect.
Very usefull, I will recommend it to my friends
New to archery, I found this app very intuitive and easy to use. Many thanks to the authors.

Good app to use but it has its own share of drawbacks : can't backup and restore data from my old phone. No help is available for retrieving the backup. Some inputs from development team would be handy.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Please try the latest beta version. It contains some fixes related to backup import issues.

google_play_reviews.content: Super funn

The one thing that need to be fix is the graphic chart. When i shoot pass midnight the graphic chart looks messed up. I know not many people shoot pass midnight, but hey, wouldn't it be great if it is run the way it suppose to?

This app is very helpful but sadly is no longer usable on a smart watch, which was my main reason for picking this product. The only thing I would like to see is my Handicap score. a place to record it would be perfect and if you stored my email and the score keepers email - one for indoor and one for outdoor, we could then submit scores at the push of a button at the end of the day.

Very helpful and useful. But if can be multiple accounts would be great

This  is a great app. I am only scratching the surface of its capabilities. Both I and my 11 year old son use it constantly. Saves a lot of fluffing around with paper scoresheets and then translating to spreadsheets.   Thoroughly recommended- I would pay for this app!
almost perfect but very very good
I love this app. The only thing that would make it better would be release aid tracking. I shoot both thumb and hinge releases with my compound bow.

this app is very helpful when come to collecting score and it gives you a chart to see your improvement all for free withe no ads, what could be better!!

Nice clean interface. Very easy to use and has all the features i could wish for. Only downside is that at the moment the backup and restore are not working. My phone broke and the new one restored all app settings apart from this one. Restoring any of the googke drive backup files simply reset the app. Please address this issue.
I love this app. It's pretty useful and i like how there's a timer
i wish you put Sight mark Setup for this App, so i don't have to write the note which set up i have to use for different distance

This is a very flexible app, you can use it to quickly record the score numbers or get technical and plot positions etc.  The thing that has really sold me is how you can email a pdf of your scoresheet to the club secretary, I've never done that role yet but she assures us that she prefers receiving info this way.

A really good application. Easy to use with the latitude to customize according to your individual needs. If there was one recommendation, it would be to include the facility of a second or third scorecard, for league or tournament shoots.
I love the statistics and ease of use. There needs to be an ability to edit line chart based on end not time taken, on X axis. Also need to be able to mark inside out X and normal X.
Great app for scoring/trending. Please, please add ASA/IBO 3D scoring!!!!
Excellent app

great app... really helped me dial in my bow and track my shooting. only problem is I can't figure out how to set up a second round on a practice day. if I could figure this out it would be 5 stars all the way!
Simply a perfect app with a lot of options and features! The best I have ever tested!

this seems like a great app so far! there are some bits of it that i don't quite understand yet though and i was hoping someonw could help me. i recently shot two indoor rounds and decided to log them under 'training with standard round'. for some reason the app automatically assigned a target size and distance to these rounds, both of which were wrong and both of which i can't figure out how to change! is there somewhere i can do this similarly to in the 'free training' option? Thanks
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! The idea behind standard rounds is exactly that you have a predefined target face, diameter and distance. You can choose from the list of predefined rounds or define your own round. Alternatively you can use the Free Training where you can adjust the settings per round. Changing the type afterwards is not possible.

good Apps for training with virtual face target

simple straightforward, can we have iOS version too?

I love the software - easy to use.  Love the timer which you can turn off or on.   I would love if you could add ratings to shoots.  This would be simple modification and would allow archers to compare there shooting on different rounds.  My second thing I would love to see is a ratings table for archers which they could post scores to after they shoot.  So archers everywhere can compete and track.    Fantastic work.
fantastic app
Thank you my friend

This app is a must have for any archer. The inputs are very user friendly. The stats are exactly what is needed for tracking. Very happy I found this tool as it will definitely help in my progress. Helpful..great

I really love this app, I've been shooting for a year and this has really helped me track my progress. However it's becoming really annoying when I have to look at all my scores to find my PB for each round. Is it possible to add a PB page so my best scores are all available on one page.

google_play_reviews.content:
Super helpfull training tool. Records scores and arrows, graphs results in 
easy to understand visuals. Recommend super highly for anyone serious about 
trying to improve target scores.

Brilliant, the best archers score pad. Does everything I could ask, 
thoroughly recommended

Absolutely love this app. As I am learning it is really good way to track 
progress - the UI for placing the arrows is super intuitive and the 
statistics are great. Seriously good job, developer!
Best
A very helpful app for any archer both a beginner and a grizzled pro
Very helpful apps

The best archery app I've found so far! It offers detailed performance analysis in the form of graphs and shot grouping, allows for various targets, lets you save different equipment sets so you can compare how they shoot, add weather conditions, and more. The only things I would change about this app would be the addition of a few more target styles, and the ability to input custom distances, as there are many people who shoot at odd yardages, such as 15 and 25 yards. I have a slight issue with the app crashing after taking a photo of the target, but I believe that may be due to my phone's low memory. All in all, an amazing app!
Does everything very easy for the archer
Really good.    Can edit without any trouble
Its good enough....
Great app!

Love this app however it needs the ability to export scores in excel format.  For the moment although you and the target captain can sign the scoresheet, it can only be exported as a PDF, which is unusable for most club records keepers.
Great app. Lots of different features that are very important to improving your game.
Excellent for archers. Keeps perfect records of practice sessions!
Great app to keep scores on. Able to customize almost everything and tracks your progress. Love it
Great app! Very good for tracking your progress and easy to use. I recommend this app for new and experienced archers! 10/10 aka X

Really very good. many years ago I wrote a Visual Basic application for iPaq (Archery Logbook) with many many things equals to this app.  This one is very well done, its easy to use, fast to record shots, and provides very useful information. I Like very much the ability to record the order and the number of the arrows then you can see groups made by arrow, and/or shooting order. You can improve your shooting, fine tune your equipment, and adjust your sight scope much better and precise. Using this application correctly makes your training sessions double efficiency. Thanks for this contribution to archery and.... When is going to be available for IOS devices too?
The best app ever

google_play_reviews.content: Best app ,It works.Very usefull .

The best.

google_play_reviews.content: I love the app. However, after I updated it, I am now forced to input a arrow number each time I try to insert a value. Is it possible to turn this feature off? If not, I would love if you could implement it.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Hi Steven,
Sure, just uncheck the "Arrow numbering" option when you create a new training. The checkbox is placed below the arrow selection.

google_play_reviews.content: Amazing little app. Does every kind of scoring you would ever need. Also let's you keep track of your equipment very easily. Definitely is the best archery scoring app on the market. Highly recommend!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks :)

google_play_reviews.content: Just wanted to update this, as I've been using this app at the range. It works brilliantly. It's fast and simple to use while shooting, so other archers aren't waiting around for you and you can maintain your "zen". It also records the arrow positions, which is much more useful to look through afterwards than just numbers. This was definitely the right app to choose.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review! Glad to hear :)

google_play_reviews.content: Yeah I use this and it's super Cool it's help me to manage my score

Love the app so far. The only problem I have is that the arrow size will not change on a custom round. I could not find a 300 round 5 spot round so I made a custom one and all my arrow holes are pin holes even though I have .390" arrows selected. The arrow size works on the Vegas round that I found though. Other than that it works great.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! The arrow sizes are drawn relative to the size of the target face. So I guess you have selected a 5 spot target face with a huge diameter. Drop me an e-mail if you need further assistance or it still does not work with a smaller target faces ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: One of the most complete Archery scoring apps that I tried. Put a dark mode in the app and it will make it way less battery consuming and easy to look at.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! I'll consider adding a dark more ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: The best scoring apps, period
Nice app. My main archery recording data base. Any chance of a print option for bow and arrow record pages in the future updates?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It's planned üòâ https://github.com/DreierF/MyTargets/issues/281

google_play_reviews.content: Love this app. However am I missing something in that I can't add notes to first round or overall session?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review! You can add comments to rounds by long pressing on the round and selecting edit. But the next major version gets the ability to add comments to trainings, rounds and ends and will make it a lot easier accessable.

google_play_reviews.content: Great app for practicing and capturing your progress. All the stats are there and entering scores are super easy. Would love to see a "pro" version of this app that can be used in actual comps where scores are similtaniously captured on multiple devices and sent to a master device in a Google Sheet. Awesome work guys!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review! Multiple archers are already planned, but I can't promise any release date any time soon.

google_play_reviews.content: Would be a 5 star but missing the function to find out your personal best for each standard round. Hopefully that can be added??
google_play_reviews.replyContent: It's on my to-do list, but didn't have time yet to implement it ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Great way to record important sight markings and keep an archive of scores. Thanks

Great app. With full control over targets, distances, style and timer there is a bit of a learning curve to this app but well worth it. Packed with great features and much more than an electronic score card, especially the desperation pattern.
Perfect. The effort and expertise that has gone into producing this app is obvious from its user friendly interface, fluid simplicity of use and its many built-in functions.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your review üôÇ

google_play_reviews.content: The only thing I feel is missing is a way to explain what I'm looking at after I shoot for the day. I don't understand the arrow Ranking system.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback!
That's definitely something I want to improve in the future. The arrow ranking sorts your arrows by their standard deviation/group size. So arrows archiving consistent small groups are ranked top. If you have further questions don't hesitate to ask in the beta testers group ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: I've used this app for months and it has really helped me tune my bows and my form. Always aim for the gold...
This is amazing. I have never had such a great understanding of my progress. It also allows me to double check my scores in competition.
Just Awesome
Very usefull application for an archer...Thank you

Kenapa di handphone saya (moto G) tidak bisa melakukan input score melalui layar dispersion pattern. Hanya bisa melakukan input lewat keyboard. Tolong feedback...  Update : Permasalah sy sudah d respon dan skarang sdah bs d pakai lagi.ad kesalahan ukuran arrow yg saya input
google_play_reviews.replyContent: If you have any issue please contact me via Email. I won't be able to help you here in the reviews. And if possible please answer in English :)

google_play_reviews.content: First day using this app and getting back into archery. Bit of a learning curve but very straight forward. One thing i would love to see though would be an option to set distances ( simillar to arrow selection ) if your ranges are unkown and for tracking purposes be able to see groupings by range. Maybe seperate colored circles around the two farthest shots for each range ? Other than that amazing app keep up the good work. Oh and a port to IOS.  Update: Noticed the new grouping features in the most recent update while practicing on 115 targets. Amazing job! The choices for grouping worked perfectly to show exactly what was needed to help improve my shots! Cant wait for the next update. One thing that we noticed was it would be helpful to be able to flip the 3D targets as not all targets face the same direction.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for the feedback!
Setting unknown distances before entering the results is already planned. Would it be sufficient for you to see the groupings in the statistics or would you expect to be able to do this in the input screen?
iOS port will probably not happen in the near future. I would have to do this full-time instead of spare time ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: You can take notes for rounds, not ends. You can't really record yardage. You can record yards if the whole event is the same distance, but for 3d (marked/ unmarked/ rangefinder ok) it is impossible to record your performance at different distances.  Recommended fixes: notes for every end, ability to record marked distance for every end.  Update: How do you reset arrow #s I keep more arrow in my quiver than are used per target and I would like to keep track of individual arrow performance Still waiting on variable yardage.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your valuable feedback! Everything you have said is already planned for future releases :). Update: I didn't forget variable yardage, but I had to focus on my research recently and hence didn't find any time to push development forward. I hope the feature makes it into 2.6.0.

google_play_reviews.content: Amazing app, I've recently taken up archery and it has been an effortless aid! The only improvements for me would be: -The ability to scale scoresheet to paper size when printing to pdf -Toggling Imperial/Metric scoring on some rounds (may already be there but I couldn't find it)
Perfect | edit: It's been more than a year since I started using this app. And no-app can beat this!! Keep up the good work.
Great app. Easy to use. Just started using it and was the only person using it at my club, but that won't be the case next week. Lots of interest from other club members.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I'm glad to hear that :)

google_play_reviews.content: Really nice app! What is missing is the ability to have two or more people!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: That's planned, but will take some time ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Super useful and lots of features for personal performance tracking. Awesome app!
It's great

This is a brilliant app! So useful with good analytics and great selection of every archery round and target face you can think of. Florian is a great guy - I emailed him this morning with a bug I'd noticed in some scoring on the new version and he's emailed me within an hour to say he's working on it and within a few hours to say it's all fixed. Great support for a free app so be sure to make a donation to keep this developing! Can't wait to go and shoot again now!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the bug report! I'll look into it soon.

google_play_reviews.content: Great app, been using to track my progress for a few months now. Only problem with it is that it really slows down when it's got a lot of data, after shooting every other day for 3 months or so, it takes a minute or so to open the graph. Any changes take a long time while the phone thinks about it. Other than that it's great.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for your feedback!
 I will try to do some performance optimizations in one of the next versions.

google_play_reviews.content: Great app. Every time I show someone at the club they download it.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the advertisement :)

google_play_reviews.content: Excellent app good for quick scores.  If I were able to choose a free round with more than 12 arrows and were able to see total distribution filtered by arrow number then i would use this app over Artemis any day.  The distribution chart is a bit useless for any fine analysis really.  But for quick scores, ideal.  The graph is pointless.
Great app best score keeper out there. My only request would be a x counter for shooting those 3 and 5 spots
Great app
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the feedback and your donation ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: This app is better than the one I actually paid for!
Excellent app to track while training.
Just works, simple and easy. I'm just starting my archery training but it already shown it's utility.
Excellent once used to it.
Great app for keeping scores. So many choices of shooting too and custom for if you are doing something different.

Two years using this app andbit is every bit as easy to use as ever. Great interface that is quick and grest visual graphs showing progress etc.  Florian, how do I set app to save results automatically to SD card? Hi Florian, I had a phone failure and realised over a years worth of archery scores were lost. Is it possible to save data automatically to SD card rather then the phone, without having to export every time I want to save data
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for the review and the clarification!
This feature is coming with the next release and is currently in beta. You will get the option of automatic backups to your phone or even to cloud (Google drive) in adjustable intervals (dayly, weekly, monthly).

google_play_reviews.content: Absolutely love this app, it is now my go to app for scoring my club archery. I just email the completed scoresheet straight to our Handicap Officer and he takes it from there. One issue I have is that if I hold my phone in portrait rather than landscape and email the scoresheet it misses off the right hand side of the scoresheet?? But now I know just to hold the phone in landscape I'm fine with that, just a tip if others are having this issue. Also please Florian could you tell me how to enter a target captains name on to the score sheet? Keep up the great work Florian!!!  30/01/2017 Thank you Florian, for your quick response to my queres.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Thanks for the review :)
There is currently no way to add the target captains name, but I will add that option.
Regarding the cut off: That is something I want to change in the future, but getting this right is rather complicated. At the moment the app kind of takes a screenshot of the scoresheet. That's why it works in landscape mode ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Incredibly useful app. I train quite often and I like to track my scores as a way to see how im doing overall and using this app has been a breeze. The ability to create a printable scoresheet and graphed scoring data is sooo much easier than just tracking everything myself. Some issues include when deleting rounds the app crashes, and that the round numbers become duplicated (for example there are 2 rounds but they're both labelled as round 1 - attempting to edit them crashes the app as well.) Hopefully these are resolved.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for the review. The issues are already resolved in the current beta version and it will be published to the stable channel in a few weeks I guess.

google_play_reviews.content: Brand new to archery, this is easy to use, intuitive, and great for tracking my development. Love it!

This program is great.  My only recommendation for custom rounds is to be able to select scores.  For instance, I shoot a 3d league that scores 14,11,10,8,5,M.  Would be nice to pick those numbers on the ibo gave for a custom round.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I can add that, but you need to provide me a little bit more context. Which exact target face are you referring to? Which of the zones should be scored at how many points. I guess an email would be easier to discuss that ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: New archer, best app overall. The thing that sets this app apart is the arrow distribution maps and analysis sections. These really help in setting up a bow and tracking progress respectively. One issue, perhaps my understanding or lack there of. Only the inner X ring scores 10, the outer 10 ring scores 9 on the WA full 122cm target. Not sure why?                  Update: thanks for the prompt reply, issue addressed on a the same day I posted and it was taken as something to improve. Class act Florian D.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks! You have to set the scoring style to 10,9,8,.. when selecting the target face to use the compound scoring schema you described. Since this is a little bit unintuitive and often leads to confusion I will change the labels to recurve style and compound style with on of the next updates ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: I had been using ArcherzUpshot, but it is no longer available.  The program looks good and is easy to use.  There are a few things that would be nice to have.  1. The arrow image reflect the diameter entered.  2. See cumulative center shot, and grouping of all arrows shot.  3. Select arrow numbers, to be able to see if there is a bad arrow in the quiver.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! 3. is already possible, but will get easier with the next update. 2. Is also coming with the next update. 1. Should also already apply. There's just a bug that it is not correct displayed for WA Spot which will also get fixed soon.

google_play_reviews.content: It fits to my needs for tracking my archery training rounds. It is well designed for usage on target and 3D training rounds. Uses clean straight-forward workflow. It does what it says just right.  I have minor issues when experimenting with the training creation and configuration. It crashes on my device when trying to edit new empty training entry. This doesn't interfere with the main workflow thus I don't care too much. I didn't find a way, how to export the report on devices running Android 4.3 (actually any lower than 4.4). Obviously, the report was intended for printing, but the older devices don't support it. I would be more interested in the possibility of publishing the report online, sharing it or exporting it to Drive in some way. I was just thinking, that it would be nice to have it. I'm not missing it myself (that much), but if you would need/like to publish or share your scores, you may not get to far with this app. On the other hand, the printing might be the way for newer devices, but I can't verify.
I have just started using it. It is very easy to use and it seems to do everything you could want. Great piece of software.
Needs clout option though

I started shooting compound bows just for relaxation, after a few years I started focusing on competitive archery. This app is great, keeps track of all my bow setups, arrow configurations and my progress.  I love the way it now splits up my progress on different target types, has support for both metric and imperial readings as well as the tournament buzzer.  All of this has showed me over the last couple of months, even though I do not always feel that I am progressing, I sure as hell am doing better and better every day.  Great app.

Absolutely LOVE this app!!! It is wonderful to keep track of my daughter's scores, tournaments, and it even will show you all the history in a line graph to see the progress! Awesome! I only wish the way to back up your data was easier. Hopefully in the future updates this will be easier. Thanks!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Hi Viki, there is an option in the settings to create a backup that in turn can be imported on another phone. Backup to a cloud account is planned for a laster version ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Best scoring App that I ever use,Florian is very nice and putting lots of afford to make changes for update. This will be the only app that I will recommence to all archers in Hong Kong from now on!

Love the application, but since it updated I can't find all the standard rounds. Have they been removed?        No worries, I'm just glad you have taken the time to make such a great app to start with. Thanks.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: No they are still there. This is a bug that I will fix as soon as possible. I'm sorry.

google_play_reviews.content: Excellent app that keeps improving with every update. Includes wind speed/direction, adjustable shooting timer, adjustable date, and a choice between putting in just the numbers themselves (perfect for old recorded scores) or where the arrows landed on the target.
Wicked app!

Hey,  this apps is so great, detail yet easy to used. i am new with android wear, and wanna use this apps feature for it.  my phone :  Asus Padfone S, OS 5.0 my android wear: Sony Smartwatch3 OS 6.0.1 . After a couple of time repairing and reset via pc companion, it's synced. Great.... :D
clean interface, fast and easy data entry flow. no needless custom interface, just the familiar android style.
It really helps, I use it every time I train.
Great tool for training and tournament use.
Superb update. Absolutely lovely app, works well.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback. Imperial distances and a lot have been added in the last release ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Very easy to use, and has all features that I needed.
Makes scoring super easy.  Great functionality.
Excellent no nonsense app, does what it advertises and the new update is amazing,  big thumbs up developers,  can't wait until the option to have multiple archers
Simply superb
I've used many archery companions but nothing steps to this, the material design is a massive plus!
Simple archery training companion. Must have! I hope you can enchanted it for Samsung Gear S2 though...
Love it

I'm an intermediate archer and this app was the best one around. Easy to use, simple yet elegant graphics and has the scoring tools and archer needs. Would love to have grouping analysis in order to easily see my shooting patterns.
Easy to operate and smooth. I enjoy the shot plotting feature!
So simple and so useful. Can't beloved this app. Just so happy I downloaded it.
You just push on the center of the target and it's perfect every time?.... Who designed this?
google_play_reviews.replyContent: I guess you misunderstood the purpose of the app. This is not a game, but a tool to track your real archery scores. So please be fair!

google_play_reviews.content: What a load of SH1TE.

Good concept, nice design, lacking in customization settings. It limits you to a max of 10 arrows which sucks as I shoot a dozen during practice. Also limited to metric distances, with no way to change settings to imperial. Obviously designed with compound bows in mind instead of traditional archery as it uses terms like vanes instead of feathers or a more generic term like fletching.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! The app now supports up to 12 arrows and imperial scoring ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: My targets Archery
I won't feed your unhealthy diet! Stick in a "buy me a super healthy feta and chicken salad with fresh fruit smoothie" and I'll do it. ;)
I can't seem to be able to score a 10 when the arrow mark touches the inner X ring. The system says its a 9. Plus its only WA rounds. Doesn't have GNAS Imperial rounds.
As I am a fairly new archer this is a good way to track my progress. Would have liked to score more than one archer since my friend has only an iPhone and no good apps like this üòÅ

This app has been a great way of keeping track of my progress. It is intuitive to use and has helped me enjoy my archery. I agree that it would be nice to include imperial scoring but that is my only criticism. Great app!
Awesome!
Does what I need, but be sure to occasionally use the back up feature to save over to your external sd card.
Minimum effort needed to keep logs of your shooting. Runs well on my Nexus 9
Great app, quick and easy to use, quicker than writing on paper, and lets me see ongoing stats. And free!
Really help me on the field, especially the android watch extension!
Crashes on my phone every time I click on the options button. Other than that everything else works fantastic. Shared it with my club and going to give it a good testing.

I really love that you took the effort to make scoring possible in a visual way and that you can get a visual average of shots,  not just score average .  I'm a really big fan of stats.  There are a few more I'd like to see. I'd like for the app to calculate average distance from average shot. So after a round,  app would show where average shot was (as it already does)  but,  also,  the absolute average distance that shots were from that point. A sort of measure of spread.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for your feedback! I'll try to come up with something ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: I love the app. Can you please make it possible to change the distance. NASP children shoot at 10 and 15 meter they shoot 3x 10m and 3x 15m.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: The beta version already supports this, so it will be available in the next release ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Beautiful app, has everything I need and more. Great work. :-)
The best archery app i found on google play

I really like the app, best I've seen, but I would like to score for multiple archers in a competition round. My daughter and I shoot together and I would like to be able to score her end, then mine, shoot the next end, score her end, then mine etc.
Excellent

Find that between passes the scoring display is a bit glitchy. I'll score say a passe of 3 arrows, click next and turn the phone screen off. A couple ofibutes later I'll turn the phone on and click the colours to score and no scoring symbols appear at the bottom, however clicking prev and the next makes them appear.
Great app still testing as I'm new to archery.

Lots of good options like a timer and arrow grouping and I hear preset rounds and imperial scoring are coming soon, hopefully with target face size, if possible I would like to see bows by draw weight too. And the export function is a really good idea, save the data!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: All features you would like to see are coming with the next version. It is currently in the final beta. If you want to try it out even before you are welcome to join the beta testers group :)

google_play_reviews.content: Only photos
google_play_reviews.replyContent: This is no fake! Could you please write me an E-Mail and tell me what is not working for you?

google_play_reviews.content: Easy to use, easy to set up and records arrow position. Desperately needs added feature of imperial scoring and the ability to select competition rounds from a pre populated list
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thanks for your feedback! Imperial scoring and competition rounds are coming with the next version ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: This is a great app for keeping track of arrow hits, scores, and progress. Love being able to select the different style targets. Needs to add Imperial distance selection as well for my 5 star rating. I'd like to be able to see whether I was shooting 20 yds or 20 m for different events. Thanks.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Imperial measurement is coming with the next version ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Great app

I am a archer that's really serious in archery, it keeps y scores what i shoot in real 720 and indoor. Please give me a email address  that i can tell you what to do when scoring the arrow and making a new round
Needs imperial distances. Wear support is great, but when adding the score from the watch it adds it twice to the score chart.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Imperial distances are coming with the next release

google_play_reviews.content: Sehr genial!  Ist geplant Scoretables f√ºr 3D-Parcours einzubauen?   Vor allem die Anbindung von AndroidWear macht es f√ºr mich absolut top!
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Ist noch nicht direkt geplant, aber keine schlechte Idee. Kommt auf meine ToDo Liste ;-)

google_play_reviews.content: Loving this app, helps me to see how I am doing at a glance with the graphs and scoring.  Would be great to score multiple archers at once though!
Great to help a new person and powerful enough to help the experienced

A really smooth app that's simple to use but very powerful. Would love to see the following features to take it to the next level: imperial distances, GNAS 1,3,5,7,9 scoring and the ability to take photos rather than having to plot the arrows by have / to compliment and speed up plotting by overlaying the photo (interesting challenge to scale and align the photo...)
I would have gone for 5 stars if it was possible to put sight markers in Yards as well as Meters but other than that I think this is great for tracking my progress :)
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Imperial measurement is coming with the next update!

google_play_reviews.content: This app is very easy to use while out on the range. I like the export option as well. I wish you could choose where to save the backup file so I could store it on Dropbox.
I hate this

Very good app.    I like the way of selecting bow and arrow combinations, as it makes it easy to track the parameters of a round. This is useful if you shoot different bow and arrow combinations.    However it should also have the possibility to input weather and location in the same way.    scoring screen is a little bit difficult to use at first, but gets better with use. I prefer the zoomable screen in "archery scorer lite" which is pretty much perfect for entering arrow positions (if you have a good score level, you can zoom in to just the red/yellow rings... we dont need the black and white very often).  Statistics are a bit strange - especially if you change bows from time to time.  Scoreboard is too small to read.  but still a good and useful app
The stupidest app I've used
